item.title: Great dataviz examples in rstats
item.description: Here come some stunning examples of data visualizations, all built with R. R code of each diagram is available at the source. Enjoy! Plotting geo maps along with subplots in ggplot2 I like this one by Ilya Kashnitsky: Similarly, by the same author: Great work, @ikashnitsky! Cirlize (Chord) diagrams Plotting association in a circular form yields aesthetic examples of diagrams, see the following examples This work is from Zuguang Gu; see his package circlize.
